text:
Hello
  In my build script I want to place java task with input and outpur redirection
That is:

      <java classname="package.classname" classpath="classpath"
            input="input_file"
            output="output_file">
      </java>

After task execution I have in the output_file

   Opening input_file
   expected output from the command

Ant adds one line "Opening input_file" to the output, making the result unusable.
creator: roman@mikronika.com.pl
